sentences.en: ...a mixture of experimental jazz, soul and funk.
sentences.cn: ...实验性爵士乐、灵魂乐和疯克乐的混合。

sentences.en: But there are crucial differences between downloading fiction and downloading funk.
sentences.cn: 但下载小说和下载那些重金属音乐之间却有很大的不同.

sentences.en: Durable - goods orders suggest investment spending may be recovering from its recent funk.
sentences.cn: 耐用品订单暗示投资开销可能将会从最近的低谷中恢复.

sentences.en: He was in a blue funk! Worse than me!
sentences.cn: 他神经极为紧张！比我还糟！

sentences.en: He'sin a blue funk right now because his girlfriend just dumped him.
sentences.cn: 他现在的心情低落到极点,因为他刚被女朋友甩了.

sentences.en: I believe the fellow himself was half crazed with funk.
sentences.cn: 我相信那个家伙自己一定也害怕得要发疯了.

sentences.en: I guess I just work up in a funk this morning.
sentences.cn: 我猜我只是在今早醒来时感到茫然无措.

sentences.en: It isn't a natural thing for a boy to funk water.
sentences.cn: 男孩怕水是不近情理的事.

sentences.en: Jeson has been collecting funk art since the mid 1960 s.
sentences.cn: 杰森从20世纪60年代中期就开始收集非理性艺术作品.

sentences.en: My face went crimson (which it does out of sheer funk).
sentences.cn: 我的脸变得通红（我极度恐慌时就会如此）。

sentences.en: She’s in a funk about giving her talk on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 她在为星期天的演讲犯愁。

sentences.en: That song was the old Grand Funk Railroad hit'Locomotion '.
sentences.cn: 这是一首老 格兰德庞克 铁路流行歌“火车头”.

sentences.en: The courage lead to heaven, the funk leads to a hell.
sentences.cn: 勇气通往天堂, 怯懦通往地狱.

sentences.en: The patient in a blue funk when he was ill.
sentences.cn: 当生病的时候,病人的情绪就会陷入阴郁中.

sentences.en: The patient was in a blue funk when he was ill.
sentences.cn: 那位患者生病时心情十分忧虑.

sentences.en: Their version of jazz funk is a pale imitation of the real thing.
sentences.cn: 他们演奏的音乐不过是对真正的乡土爵士乐的拙劣模仿.

sentences.en: There was Walther Funk , the shifty - eyed nonentity who had succeeded Schacht.
sentences.cn: 在被告席上还有沙赫特的继任者,目光躲闪、无足轻重的人物瓦尔特-丰克.

phrases.tran_cn: 使乐曲具有乡土音乐的成分（或风格）

trans.tran_en: a style of music with a strong  rhythm  that is based on  jazz  and African music
to avoid doing something because it is difficult, or because you are afraid

trans.tran_cn: （因恐惧）避开（某事物），害怕，使闻到刺鼻的味道
